version_description:
In 5.3.1
-Added links for textures
-Added new recipes for Minecraft 1.9
-New tips, new Furniture, new Seeds
-Bug fixes

In 5.3:
-Added Textures!
-Added (re-added...) Servers
-New Furniture
-New Seeds
-New Vehicle
-Other

5.3.3:
-Fixed problem where ads were showing to everyone (make sure to restore purchases if needed)
-Bug fixes
-Content Fixes

5.3.2:
-Bug fixes
-Content Fixes
-Added help for Textures

In 5.3.1
-Added links for textures

-Bug fixes and content fixes
-Added MORE guides for mods (note that neither Minecraft or MCPE can be modded with this app), these are just guides/information!
-More Guide Material!!

In 5.4:
-Updated for new versions of Minecraft
-Added
